text: watyna bani 'iisrayiyl shraye wadhat fi alhlal walhram, wdlalat tabayan alhaqu min albatl, fama akhtalafuu 'iilaa min baed ma ja'ahum alelm, waqamat alhujat elyhm, wa'iinama hamalhm ealaa dhlk baghy bedhm ealaa bed; tlbana llrfet walryast, 'iina rabak -ayha alrswl- yahkum bayn almkhtlfyn min bani 'iisrayiyl yawm alqiamat fima kanuu fih yakhtalifun fi aldnya. wafi hdha tahdhir lihadhih al'umat 'ana tasluk mslkhm
